title: LIVE: Pentagon chiefs address the crisis in Afghanistan after Taliban take Kabul — 8/18/2021
author: CNBC Television
description:
Secretary of Defense Lloyd Austin and Chairman of the Joint Chiefs of Staff U.S. Army Gen. Mark Milley are slated to address the nation from the Pentagon Wednesday afternoon following the dramatic fall of the Afghan national government to the Taliban.
